msgSnippet: Might be a classpath problem. Make sure your classpath points to both junit.jar and the folder where you installed junit. Check readme.html; there s a note in

Might be a classpath problem. Make sure your classpath points to both
junit.jar and the folder where you installed junit. Check readme.html;
there's a note in there that says to do that. I also missed that the first
time.

-----Original Message-----
From: Andrew Kong [mailto:akong@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2001 4:07 PM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [junit] basic question


sorry I've just started working with Junit - I can't get TestRunner to find
the sample class Alltests that is mentioned in the installation notes - am I
missing something basic here?
